subject: He played some audio from her YouTube video where she talks about coming off the hunger strike and tells people that it could end badly for them if others continued.
body:
GPSI Announces Market Attack Into $1 Trillion Market!

Global Payment Solutions
Symbol: GPSI
Price: $0.03

GPSI announced its plans to address the huge influx of immigrant workers
into the US that need banking solutions that they otherwise would not
qualify for. This market is expected to represent over $1 Trillion
dollars to be managed by 2008. GPSI provides viable solutions to this
market. This is hot, read the news and watch for more Monday! Get on
GPSI first thing Monday!

Eric played the clip from the phone call and Howard told him they didn't
have much to talk to him about now that he's no longer against them.
He told Artie that KC looked like a winner while Artie looks like a
loser whether he's winning or losing. She wondered if they hate her or
something. Artie was wearing his sun glasses this morning so Howard
goofed on him about that and asked him if he did any heroin over
vacation.
Howard told her she's welcome anytime.
Artie said he met her at a gig a few years ago and gave her a call to go
out on this date.
Eric The Midget In Wrestling Trivia. Howard said that last week the fans
voted for Sanjaya and kept him in for another week.
He said KC had a lot of problems and didn't know just how messed up he
was.
Howard and the guys were talking about how big this Sanjaya kid has
become and how he's got to be the biggest star ever on there.
Howard told Gary to get this lawyer chick on the phone as well as the
two people who were fasting so he can talk to them. Howard was also
saying that he got a call from Melissa Gilbert who asked him what he was
doing about this Sanjaya thing because she hates him.
Artie said that Bill should have just ended the segment at that point
when he heard her stupid comments.
Gary said that Charlie, Miss Black Howard Stern, was joking in her tape
and said that she wouldn't have a black baby if she got pregnant and had
a kid like Andrea did.
Robin thought that was amazing but Howard said that wasn't the end of
the story.
Eric The Midget In Wrestling Trivia.
She didn't cry or anything. Artie said that this new chick is also from
Philly and he'd love to get her on the show because she's got this
Philly accent that's great. Robin reminded the guys that KC had gone out
and gotten an apartment when he won the money. He said that it was very
amicable and they're not really seeing each other now. He blew it all
within a week. He decided to put ten grand on the game and won so now
he's put his bookie out of business which is something he's never done
before. He said Ralph came up with the whole show idea and was doing an
Eric the Midget impression.
Eric shot back with ''That's something you hear a lot fatso. Gary gave
Howard a letter that Jon Hein's daughter sent to him asking him to stop
with the Sanjaya thing. '' Howard said that Bill O'Reilly found some
lawyer who claims that what he's doing to American Idol is illegal.
Eric The Midget In Wrestling Trivia. Howard and the guys watched her
video from when she was evaluated back in June of last year. Artie said
he had a good time but the relationship with the chick from Philly has
kind of had it's last hurrah. Artie said once he won that money he
stopped thinking about dieting.
Howard told the story of KC's gambling and how he had hit a royal flush
on goldenpalace.
He said he really didn't want to be committed to anyone at this point
and she kind of got it. Artie said that Bill should have just ended the
segment at that point when he heard her stupid comments.
Robin said that Akira is still serious about Artie and wondered if he
got her. Eric was talking about how he'd still like to go on a date with
Diana Degarmo.
Artie said that this new chick is also from Philly and he'd love to get
her on the show because she's got this Philly accent that's great. '' 
Artie's Dating Discussed.
Artie said that Bill should have just ended the segment at that point
when he heard her stupid comments.
Miss Howard Stern Depressed.
Eric played the clip from the phone call and Howard told him they didn't
have much to talk to him about now that he's no longer against them.
Howard said that was the worst story he ever heard.
He went to the doctor and he's been taking vitamins.
